title: Google OAuth2 Token
description: The OAuth2 token returned by Google

access_token.description: The access token issued by the authorization server.

expires_in.description: The lifetime in seconds of the access token.

refresh_token.description: The refresh token, which can be used to obtain new access tokens using the same authorization grant.

scope.description: The scope of the access token as described by https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-3.3.

token_type.description: The type of the token issued as described by https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-7.1.

expires_at.description: The time at which the access token expires.

additional_scopes.description: Additional scopes that were requested but not granted.

missing_scopes.description: Scopes that were requested but not granted.

old_scope.description: The scope of the access token as described by https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-3.3.

old_scopes.description: The scope of the access token as described by https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-3.3.

scope_changed.description: Whether the scope of the access token has changed.

scopes.description: The scope of the access token as described by https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-3.3.
